content.html: Big Tech that has announced return to the office - usually as a hybrid setup with 2/3 days/week - and when it's due: - Microsoft: 28 March - Meta: 28 March - Google: 4 April - Apple: 11 April Who wins: policy? Exceptions for devs threatening to quit? Startups hiring remote? üçø
content.value:
Big Tech that has announced return to the office - usually as a hybrid setup with 2/3 days/week - and when it's due:

- Microsoft: 28 March
- Meta: 28 March
- Google: 4 April
- Apple: 11 April

Who wins: policy? Exceptions for devs threatening to quit? Startups hiring remote?

üçø
